title: Accidentally disenchanted
body: i was  had blood moon yasuo i  disenchanted when i trying to upgrade it  pls  riot  help me

replies.body: Oh no!!!  :(  You gotta be super careful and make sure you're picking the right option!  Maybe we can work something out, though!  We like to look at each case individually so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see what we can do!
i can't find  choice to send that pls  help plss
